Garry's Mod

Brief

Dive into the limitless world of Garry's Mod, a game that redefines creativity and player-driven content. As a sandbox game modeled after the iconic Half-Life 2, Garry's Mod (affectionately known as GMod) allows players to delve into an expansive universe of games and mini-games, all created within the community. With tools to customize nearly every aspect of your gameplay experience, you'll find yourself fully immersed in a realm where the only limit is your imagination.
